name: Darkness
details:
Digital Stereo ReverbDarkness is the deficiency or absence of light. I Love You But I’ve Chosen Darkness…
Dreadbox DARKNESS is a Digital Stereo Reverb effect pedal suitable for fretted instruments and synthesizers. Instead of having several switched algorithms, DARKNESS has a single versatile and flexible algorithm, that can create from small and smooth reflections up to huge shimmering and endless reverbs.

Flexible Shimmer Reverb with Gate function
32bit @ 48kHz Digital Effects Processor
Variable Time Scale with Modulation (Triangle or Sample & Hold)
Selectable Pitch Shift (+/-12 semitones) with variable mix amount for shimmering sounds
Up to 30sec Decay Times
2-Pole Damping Filter (High Pass or Low Pass)
Freeze function (loops 150ms of the input signal)
Versatile Gate effect with variable Attack and Release Times
True Stereo (Input and Output)
Selectable Tails Bypass

https://www.dreadbox-fx.com/darkness/
